description: Nikol Pashinyan says Armenia faces a "difficult situation" in its fight over disputed Nagorny Karabakh.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Armenian PM admits significant casualties
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Armenian PM admits significant casualties - BBC News
maintext: "Armenia is trying to attack and take control of our pipelines," he said in an interview with Turkish broadcaster Haberturk. "If Armenia tries to take control of the pipelines there, I can say that the outcome will be severe for them."
